struct sio_dgram* sio_dgram_open (  struct sio *  sio,
const char *  ipv4,
uint16_t  port,
sio_dgram_callback_t  callback,
void *  arg
) 
 

创建udp socket, 绑定到ipv4和port, 如果udp socket作为客户端使用不关心ip或port,可以ip填写0.0.0.0,port填写0.
